title: Tonari no Seki no Satou-San - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Award-winning Work   Clumsy Love Interests   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Modern Day   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: Morisaki Yuruka   森崎緩
description:
Plain, slow, and not that smart.

Plus she’s not that pretty, my classmate Satou-san.

Yet now that I’m next to her, for some reason she’s catching my interest a bit more.

A story about an uncooperative boy who is attracted to a simple girl in a neighboring seat.>
